page.title: 09Arts and Crafts - Local
page.content:
This area has a wide interest in country crafts.
Two important farm crafts are sheep shearing and ploughing. Ploughing matches are held with different classes for various types of ploughs and become very competitive. At the annual County rally the Young Farmers enter the sheep shearing contests.
The Young Farmers also hold local competitions which include woodwork, stock - judging, poultry trussing, cookery, needlework and flower arranging.
The spectrum is also widened with the author who writes for the BBC, a wood carver an artist and an embroidress who helps with the needlework in Hereford Cathedral.
